title: S1 Ep62: Buying votes
itunes:title: Buying votes
description: Politicians can bribe their way to an election win, but in a democracy we throw them out if they perform badly afterwards. Or maybe not: Jessica Leight tells Tim Phillips that vote-buying emboldens corrupt politicians to steal more, and that voters who take the handouts are also less likely to hold them to account.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
